title: Viscoid
description: From the author of Blood Tide and Clown Friday: 79000 words of horror, crime, gore and darkness. PLUS bonus content, Prologue and first chapter of Clown Friday. VISCOID â€“ horror has a new essence... MURDER Mist settles... a sound of liquid seething... a coiling abomination that brings blood and carnage. Something monstrous has come to the small city of Lechester, and it craves human flesh. MYSTERY Detective Inspector Jack Riley must solve the mystery of the three murders in the city. What fiend can dismember a body in a street without being seen? What murderer can slaughter a woman in her bathtub behind a locked door? And then there are the suction wounds... HORROR A horror has been spawned and it is nightmarish beyond belief. In the wastelands, in the sewers, in the derelict buildings and forgotten places something is seething, spawning, hungering and growing...
author: Edward  Parker
